languages.text: "Вот ты и показал, что Лекс ничего не стоит — вертишь законом, как тебе удобно. Но власть так пьянит, и от нее так трудно отказаться... Я прав{mf||а}, Стракс?"

"You have demonstrated clearly that your vaunted Lex is worth nothing — you bend and mould the law to suit your desires. And yet, power is so intoxicating, so difficult to give up... Am I wrong, Strachs?"
languages.original_text: "Вот ты и показал, что Лекс ничего не стоит — вертишь законом, как тебе удобно. Но власть так пьянит, и от нее так трудно отказаться... Я прав{mf||а}, Стракс?"

traits.locale_text: "You have demonstrated clearly that your vaunted Lex is worth nothing — you bend and mould the law to suit your desires. And yet, power is so intoxicating, so difficult to give up... Am I wrong, Strachs?"

"You have demonstrated clearly that your vaunted Lex is worth nothing — you bend and mould the law to suit your desires. And yet, power is so intoxicating, so difficult to give up... Am I wrong, Strachs?"

languages.text: «Ha demostrado con claridad que su querida Lex no tiene ningún valor, ya que la pliega y moldea a voluntad. Aun así, el poder es tan embriagador, tan difícil de rechazar... ¿Me equivoco, Strachs?».
languages.original_text: "You have demonstrated clearly that your vaunted Lex is worth nothing — you bend and mould the law to suit your desires. And yet, power is so intoxicating, so difficult to give up... Am I wrong, Strachs?"

traits.locale_text: «Ha demostrado con claridad que su querida Lex no tiene ningún valor, ya que la pliega y moldea a voluntad. Aun así, el poder es tan embriagador, tan difícil de rechazar... ¿Me equivoco, Strachs?».

languages.text: “你通过扭曲律法来满足你的一己私欲。你已经清楚地让我看到，你所吹嘘的帝国律法一文不值。相比之下，权力的滋味是如此令人陶醉，让人难以割舍……我没说错吧，斯塔克斯？”
languages.original_text: "You have demonstrated clearly that your vaunted Lex is worth nothing — you bend and mould the law to suit your desires. And yet, power is so intoxicating, so difficult to give up... Am I wrong, Strachs?"

traits.locale_text: “你通过扭曲律法来满足你的一己私欲。你已经清楚地让我看到，你所吹嘘的帝国律法一文不值。相比之下，权力的滋味是如此令人陶醉，让人难以割舍……我没说错吧，斯塔克斯？”

languages.text: 「君は、自慢のレックスが無価値に等しいということをはっきりと示した。君は法をねじ曲げ、自分の望みに従うように作り変えた。だが、権力というものはなんと魅力的なのだろう。手放すのは容易ではない…間違ってはいないだろう？ストラッチス」
languages.original_text: "You have demonstrated clearly that your vaunted Lex is worth nothing — you bend and mould the law to suit your desires. And yet, power is so intoxicating, so difficult to give up... Am I wrong, Strachs?"

traits.locale_text: 「君は、自慢のレックスが無価値に等しいということをはっきりと示した。君は法をねじ曲げ、自分の望みに従うように作り変えた。だが、権力というものはなんと魅力的なのだろう。手放すのは容易ではない…間違ってはいないだろう？ストラッチス」

languages.text: "Ihr habt klar gezeigt, dass Euer vielgepriesenes Lex nichts wert ist – Ihr verbiegt und formt das Gesetz nach Euren Wünschen. Und dennoch ist Macht so verführerisch, so schwer loszulassen ... Oder habe ich unrecht, Strachs?"
languages.original_text: "You have demonstrated clearly that your vaunted Lex is worth nothing — you bend and mould the law to suit your desires. And yet, power is so intoxicating, so difficult to give up... Am I wrong, Strachs?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt klar gezeigt, dass Euer vielgepriesenes Lex nichts wert ist – Ihr verbiegt und formt das Gesetz nach Euren Wünschen. Und dennoch ist Macht so verführerisch, so schwer loszulassen ... Oder habe ich unrecht, Strachs?"

languages.text: "O çok övündüğünüz Lex'in hiçbir değeri olmadığını açıkça gördük. Emellerine hizmet edecek şekilde kanunları eğip büküyorsun. Güç; öyle sarhoş edici, öyle vazgeçmesi zor bir şey ki... Değil mi Strachs?"
languages.original_text: "You have demonstrated clearly that your vaunted Lex is worth nothing — you bend and mould the law to suit your desires. And yet, power is so intoxicating, so difficult to give up... Am I wrong, Strachs?"

traits.locale_text: "O çok övündüğünüz Lex'in hiçbir değeri olmadığını açıkça gördük. Emellerine hizmet edecek şekilde kanunları eğip büküyorsun. Güç; öyle sarhoş edici, öyle vazgeçmesi zor bir şey ki... Değil mi Strachs?"

languages.text: « En détournant la loi pour satisfaire vos propres désirs, vous avez démontré sans l'ombre d'un doute que votre précieuse Lex n'a pas la moindre valeur. Et pourtant, le pouvoir est si enivrant qu'il est difficile d'y renoncer... N'ai-je pas raison, Strachs ?
languages.original_text: "You have demonstrated clearly that your vaunted Lex is worth nothing — you bend and mould the law to suit your desires. And yet, power is so intoxicating, so difficult to give up... Am I wrong, Strachs?"

traits.locale_text: « En détournant la loi pour satisfaire vos propres désirs, vous avez démontré sans l'ombre d'un doute que votre précieuse Lex n'a pas la moindre valeur. Et pourtant, le pouvoir est si enivrant qu'il est difficile d'y renoncer... N'ai-je pas raison, Strachs ?
